cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 420 mi SSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to turn north-northeast, reach the Florida Big Bend coast Thursday, then accelerate across the southeast U.S. and out over the western Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend between Anclote River and Indian Pass

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Anclote River to Indian Pass FL; Tropical Storm Watch west of Indian Pass to Walton/Bay County line FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Gulf coast of Florida – Aripeka to Indian Pass (storm surge and wind focus)
weather_observation.wind: Only isolated gusty squalls expected; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (<5% chance).
weather_observation.rainfall: Possible outer-band showers with 1–2 inches of rain.
